name: Goalkeeper
description: The player who defends the team's goal, the only player allowed to use hands within their penalty area.

name: Center Back
description: Central defender whose primary responsibility is to prevent the opposition from scoring.

name: Left Back
description: Defender who plays on the left side of the defense.

name: Right Back
description: Defender who plays on the right side of the defense.

name: Defensive Midfielder
description: Midfielder who plays in front of the defense, focusing on breaking up opposition attacks.

name: Central Midfielder
description: Midfielder who plays centrally, balancing defensive and offensive responsibilities.

name: Attacking Midfielder
description: Midfielder who focuses primarily on creating scoring opportunities for forwards.

name: Left Midfielder
description: Midfielder who plays on the left side, providing width to the team's attack.

name: Right Midfielder
description: Midfielder who plays on the right side, providing width to the team's attack.

name: Striker
description: Forward whose main responsibility is scoring goals.

name: Left Winger
description: Attacking player who plays on the left wing, providing width to the attack.

name: Right Winger
description: Attacking player who plays on the right wing, providing width to the attack.
